articles.content: Launching August 1st for $9.99 each

articles.title: The Last of Us Part 2: Inside the Gameplay - Official Behind the Scenes - IGN
articles.description: Join members of the team at Naughty Dog for an in-depth discussion about the new and evolved gameplay experience of The Last of Us Part II. The game launches...
articles.content:
Join members of the team at Naughty Dog for an in-depth discussion about the new and evolved gameplay experience of The Last of Us Part II.
The game launches on June 19, 2020 on PlayStation 4.
